The status is "ACTIVE" for ground transports assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed ground transports. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Layovers Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew, including this layover | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew, including this layover | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew, including this layover | | arrivalFlightLegId | `'string'` | Flight leg id before the layover | | departureFlightLegId | `'string'` | Flight leg id after the layover | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the layover in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the layover in UTC | | startDateLocal | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the layover in local timezone. | | endDateLocal | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the layover in local timezone. | | durationFromStation | `'duration'` | Total time to reach the hotel in minutes | | distanceFromStation | `'string'` | Total distance to the hotel in KMs | | hotelId | `'string'` | Hotel code | | hotelName | `'string'` | Hotel name | | hotelAddress | `'string'` | H
